tutorialTips.title: DON-chan
tutorialTips.description:
A mysterious creature shaped like a drum.
He loves having fun!
Let's play the drums together and turn the world into a lively festival!

tutorialTips.title: Clothes
tutorialTips.description:
You can get DON-chan's outfits in various places.
The more outfits you have, the higher your score!
Create your very own DON-chan and play songs to your heart's content!

tutorialTips.title: Score Gauge
tutorialTips.description:
The Score Gauge is linked to your personal best score during a performance.
The closer you get to your previous best score, the more exciting the performance becomes!

tutorialTips.title: Assist Item: Performance Assist
tutorialTips.description:
Having trouble with a particular song? Try using a Performance Assist.
Even a Full Combo isn't out of the question!

tutorialTips.title: Assist Item: Long-Press Drum Roll
tutorialTips.description:
An item that lets you perform a drum roll with a long press.
You can even play with one hand!

tutorialTips.title: Score Bonus
tutorialTips.description:
Your final score is determined by adding score bonuses based on your performance.
Aim to increase your level and rank to achieve your best score.

tutorialTips.title: Ticket
tutorialTips.description:
This item is required to play songs.
Songs selected from the home screen can be played without using tickets.

tutorialTips.title: Collect Crowns
tutorialTips.description:
Collect Crowns and Badges to earn Title Points and custom titles.
Collect as many as you can to express yourself however you like.

tutorialTips.title: Drum Position Calibration
tutorialTips.description:
If the positioning of the drums doesn't feel quite right, try performing a calibration.
To do so, go to My Page → Other Menu → System Settings.

tutorialTips.title: Passport
tutorialTips.description:
Purchase a passport to remove advertisements!
"Balloon DON-chan" and "Free Pack" also remove ads
and net you items! Visit the shop to check them out!
